cause.description:
K, i'm serious about this. We are trying to raise money so my friends can stay with me, and with their other friends, by going to Bishop Ward. all we need is for like everybody to even give like a dollar, we just need money, for a bribery to try to get their parents to reconsider, and if you give money, and they dont accept the bribe, we will give you it back. contact me or either Ismael or Mariza with info oon how to help!
1. Kids Should Stay With Their Friends!
2. They Have Grown Up Here...KEEP THEM HERE!!
cause.mission: Bring Ismael and Mariza Hernandez Back To Ward...WHERE THEY BELONG!
cause.name: Bring The Hernandez's Back To Ward!
